spec_data.Name: libspiro
spec_data.Description:
This library will take an array of spiro control points and
convert them into a series of bézier splines which can then
be used in the myriad of ways the world has come to use béziers.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 04 Aug 2017 01:31:53 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Library to simplify the drawing of beautiful curves
